list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a container) break suddenly and violently apart, spilling the contents, typically as a result of an impact or internal pressure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we inflated dozens of balloons and only one burst
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi thổi phồng hàng chục bóng bay và chỉ một vụ nổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an instance of breaking or splitting as a result of internal pressure or puncturing; an explosion.
